smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function getNotificationPrefs appears to be too complex.
The function clean appears to be too complex.
The function load appears to be too complex.
The function zip appears to be too complex.
The function setupDrawer appears to be too complex.

smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface FragmentContract is too complex. Consider splitting it up.
The interface FrostContentParent is too complex. Consider splitting it up.
The interface FrostContentCore is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'BaseFragment' with '19' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function frostDownload has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.
The function frostDownload has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class OfflineWebsite is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class BaseMainActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class ImageActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function fetch is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: InstanceOfCheckForException

smells.name: MatchingDeclarationName
smells.description: If a source file contains only a single non-private top-level class or object, the file name should reflect the case-sensitive name plus the .kt extension.

smells.name: UnnecessaryAbstractClass
smells.description: An abstract class is unnecessary and can be refactored. An abstract class should have both abstract and concrete properties or functions. An abstract class without a concrete member can be refactored to an interface. An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: ExpressionBodySyntax
smells.description: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (url?.contains("?sk=h_chr") ?: false) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: url?.contains("?sk=h_chr") ?: false
Parentheses in (web.url?.contains("?sk=h_chr") ?: false) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: web.url?.contains("?sk=h_chr") ?: false
Parentheses in (web.context as? ActivityContract) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: web.context as? ActivityContract
Parentheses in (Color.alpha(Prefs.bgColor) != 255) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: Color.alpha(Prefs.bgColor) != 255
Parentheses in (Color.alpha(Prefs.headerColor) != 255) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: Color.alpha(Prefs.headerColor) != 255
Parentheses in (startsWith("https://video-") && contains(FBCDN_NET)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: startsWith("https://video-") && contains(FBCDN_NET)
Parentheses in (atStart == toStart) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: atStart == toStart
Parentheses in (position < 0 && position > -1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: position < 0 && position > -1
Parentheses in (position > 0 && position < 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: position > 0 && position < 1
Parentheses in (if (translateValue > -pageWidth) translateValue else 0f) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: if (translateValue > -pageWidth) translateValue else 0f
Parentheses in (if (it.state == BottomSheetBehavior.STATE_COLLAPSED) 0.5f else 1f) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: if (it.state == BottomSheetBehavior.STATE_COLLAPSED) 0.5f else 1f
Parentheses in (if (abrupt) "Service force stop" else "Service") are unnecessary and can be replaced with: if (abrupt) "Service force stop" else "Service"

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class WebContext defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: CollapsibleIfStatements
smells.description: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

instances.message: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.
Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

smells.name: ThrowsCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of throw statements in methods.

instances.message: Too many throw statements in the function downloadImageTo. The maximum number of allowed throw statements is 2.

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
smells.description: Data classes should mainly be used to store data and should not have any extra functions. (Compiler will automatically generate equals, toString and hashCode functions)

instances.message: The data class FrostNotification contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called withAlert
The data class FrostNotification contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called notify

smells.name: NewLineAtEndOfFile
smells.description: Checks whether files end with a line separator.

instances.message: The file build.gradle.kts is not ending with a new line.
The file Versions.kt is not ending with a new line.
The file settings.gradle.kts is not ending with a new line.
The file spotless.license.kt is not ending with a new line.
